name: Hentai Girls: Christmas
description:
Hentai Girls: Christmas is a puzzle game, in order to make the pictures restored. But please remember it the game is aiming to make you relax. So if you want, you can use cheat mode.

*About Trading Cards
Trading cards will be active when they cross the voting threshold.

  • Can undress(fully naked without marks)
  • Cheat Mode (L)
  • Easy achievements
  • Trading cards(not available yet)
  • All characters open, there are no locks
